title: You must register and have an account on cs2hvh.com
desc: Registration and account creation on cs2hvh.com are mandatory.

title: Who can play?
desc: Participation is open to individuals worldwide, without any regional restrictions.

title: Match format
desc:
All matches will be in a Best of 1 format. All matches have overtime enabled. Except for semifinals and finals, all matches will follow a single-elimination format,
 while the semifinals and finals will be conducted as best of three.

title: Players Settings.
desc: Players are required to report 30 minutes prior to their match. There will be no waiting for any team/player. Matches can only be reschuled if other 2 teams are ready to faceoff.

title: Match Timings
desc: All matches will conducted on weekends that is Saturdays/Sundays.

title: Exploits
desc: Utilizing any exploit that causes lag or disrupts the normal functioning of the server will lead to disqualification.

title: Map Choose
desc: The map type will be Wingman, and the selection process will follow a veto system.
